channel.title: OIL — it’s been a long day, love. rest your head a while. [Chill, song for girlfriend]
channel.description:
I made this track because my girlfriend was not having a good time and because I wasn’t there in person to comfort her I made her this song.
[Here it is.](https://soundcloud.com/oil-official/its-been-a-long-day-love-rest)
I hope it helps you too if you’re not in a good place. These are trying times, after all.
